channel.title: Camtasia With A Mix Of Client Help!
channel.description:
Ok, well i know im going to get "wrong sectioned" but i really need this bit of help, if a mod wishes to lock, do so. Ok well so, when i try to vid high detail on servers such as 508 HD, or runescape HD, my camtasia goes all glitchey and flashey, but on normal detail on rs it's fine..its just weird client things?
Please help, once again if this is to much off topic, lock it.
Thanks So Much, Denoria.
